snippet: A New York story, about a cabdriver turned photographer, and punctuated by the images he captures.
abstract: Nicolas Rapold reviews documentary film More Than the Rainbow, directed by Dan Wechsler.
lead_paragraph: A New York story, about a cabdriver turned photographer, and punctuated by the images he captures.

headline.seo: ‘More Than the Rainbow’ Looks at Matt Weber, Photographer
headline.main: New York Through a Lens Instead of a Windshield
